vote.title: Authorize and establish the FY 2020-21 Community Artists Program (CAP) and CAP Guidelines to provide artist services upon request by artists and non-profit organizations to teach, perform, and exhibit at host facilities in Dallas, to further the goals of the Dallas Cultural Plan 2018 and support cultural services in the City of Dallas - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
vote.description: Authorize and establish the FY 2020-21 Community Artists Program (CAP) and CAP Guidelines to provide artist services upon request by artists and non-profit organizations to teach, perform, and exhibit at host facilities in Dallas, to further the goals of the Dallas Cultural Plan 2018 and support cultural services in the City of Dallas - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
